mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_resource ( resource_name, description, resource_url, parent_id, icon, permission, create_time, update_time, state, TYPE, sys_type ) VALUES( #{resourceName}, #{description}, #{resourceUrl}, #{parentId}, #{icon}, #{permission}, now(), now(), #{state}, #{type}, #{sysType} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_resource SET resource_name=#{resourceName}, description=#{description}, resource_url=#{resourceUrl}, parent_id=#{parentId}, icon=#{icon}, permission=#{permission}, update_time=now(), state=#{state}, TYPE=#{type}, sys_type=#{sysType} WHERE resource_id = #{resourceId}
mapper.select: SELECT * from s_resource where parent_id = #{id} and state =0
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO S_ROLE_RESOURCE ( role_id, resource_id ) VALUES
(#{roleId},#{resourceId})
mapper.select:
SELECT DISTINCT rs.* FROM s_resource rs INNER JOIN s_role_resource rr ON rs.resource_id = rr.resource_id INNER JOIN s_role r ON rr.role_id = r.role_id INNER JOIN s_user_role ur ON r.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND rs.parent_id IS NULL AND r.state =0
AND sys_type= #{code}
